definition: lit. heroes usually agree (idiom); Great minds think alike.
pinyin: ying1 xiong2 suo3 jian4 lu:e4 tong2

definition: hero/outstanding/excellent/(literary) flower/blossom
United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
to appear/also written 現|现[xian4]
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
plan/strategy/outline/summary/slightly/rather/to rob/to plunder/to summarize/to omit
variant of 略[lu:e4]
like/same/similar/together/alike/with
(used in given names)/variant of 同[tong2]
see 衚衕|胡同[hu2 tong4]

sentences.english: Great minds think alike, but fools seldom differ.
sentences.chinese: 英雄所见略同，傻瓜很少意见不合。

sentences.english: Who says great minds think alike?
You agree with me. Great minds think alike.
sentences.chinese: 你同意我的看法，英雄所见略同啊。

sentences.english: Great minds think alike, that's just what I'm going to say.
sentences.chinese: 例句英雄所见略同，这正是我所要说的。

sentences.english: Yang and Lee "see eye to eye". They always have similar ideas.
sentences.chinese: 扬和李对撇子啊，总是英雄所见略同。

definition: kindred spirit
the young will be redoubtable in the years to come (idiom)/the younger generations will surpass us in time
to agree without prior consultation/to happen to hold the same view
to hit the mark with a comment (idiom)/to say sth spot on
people who don't belong together, don't get to live together (idiom)/marriages are predestined/people marry because they share common traits
pinyin: bu4 shi4 yi1 jia1 ren2 bu4 jin4 yi1 jia1 men2
related.word: 不是一家人不进一家门

definition: five hundred years ago we were the same family (idiom) (said of persons with the same surname)
pinyin: wu3 bai3 nian2 qian2 shi4 yi1 jia1

definition: to share vile habits/partners in notoriety/birds of a feather
to regret not having met earlier (idiom); It is nice to meet you finally./It feels like we have known each other all along.
jackals of the same tribe (idiom); fig. They are all just as bad as each other.
arriving early can't beat coming at the right time/perfect timing
pinyin: lai2 de5 zao3 bu4 ru2 lai2 de5 qiao3

definition: lit. persons who walk different paths cannot make plans together/to go separate ways (idiom)
pinyin: dao4 bu4 tong2 bu4 xiang1 wei2 mou2

definition: to prophesy with supernatural accuracy (idiom)/to have an incredible foresight
to make sense/reasonable
it's a small world (idiom)
pinyin: ren2 sheng1 he2 chu4 bu4 xiang1 feng2

definition: Only an outstanding talent can recognize current trends (idiom). A wise man submits to circumstances.
pinyin: shi2 shi2 wu4 zhe3 wei4 jun4 jie2

definition: lit. deep plans and distant thoughts/to plan far ahead (idiom)
